item.title: Version 0.2.0
item.description:
What's New in IDMMac 0.2.0

This update fixes critical bugs that caused file corruption and UI issues. We strongly recommend all users update immediately.

üîß Critical Bug Fixes

  • Fixed file corruption on pause/resume - Files would become corrupted when pausing and resuming downloads
  • Fixed file corruption after network loss - Downloads that were interrupted by network issues would complete but produce corrupted files
  • Fixed progress stuck at 0% - UI would show "0%" and "Preparing..." while downloads actually progressed in the background
  • Fixed duplicate tasks on resume - Multiple pause/resume cycles would create hundreds of duplicate download tasks

‚ú® Improvements

  • Better error messages - Clear explanations when downloads fail due to expired links or server issues
  • File integrity validation - Automatically validates file size before finalizing downloads to prevent corruption
  • Improved resume reliability - Downloads now properly resume from the exact byte position where they were paused
  • Allow duplicate downloads - You can now download the same URL multiple times simultaneously

üõ°Ô∏è Enhanced Safety

  • Added range rejection tracking to detect and handle servers with broken resume support
  • Segment progress is now properly saved and restored during pause/resume cycles
  • Downloads fail gracefully with clear error messages instead of silently producing corrupted files
  • Prevents data loss when download links expire during pause

This update represents significant improvements to download reliability and data integrity. If you experienced any corrupted downloads with version 0.1.1, please update immediately.
